headline: General Mills Is Down 20% and Betting Promotions Can Win Back Shoppers
summary: A household name in kitchens around the country and the world, General Mills (NYSE:GIS) shares trade at $44.93, down 24% over the past year and just $2.14 above the 52-week low of $42.79. The catalyst: a guidance reset that cut full-year organic sales by 1.5% to 2% and adjusted EPS by 16% to 20% for fiscal ... General Mills Is Down 20% and Betting Promotions Can Win Back Shoppers
